channel.title: Summoning
channel.description:
Okay, since I'm too stupid to figure out how to start a 508 and no one will help me, I'm trying to add a kind of summoning to my 317. I want to make custom pouches for the monsters and everything...But I only really know how to make equipment....How would I create like a pouch? I mean like, would there be inits or what? I don't really see why there should be...But how would the item have examine info or an actual name then...?
Please help! :) -Setsuna

item.title: Summoning
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Summoning
item.dc:creator: @i_nelson_i i nelson i
item.description:
@i_nelson_i wrote:

if(i == id) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "spawn"; class8.anInt174 = 2596; //Inv & Ground class8.anInt181 = 2000; //Zoom class8.anInt190 = 572; class8.anInt198 = 1200; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 16; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = -1; class8.anInt200 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt199 = -1; class8.aString170 = "name"; class8.aByteArray178 = "examine".getBytes(); }

this should work *change the use to what you want it to say when u right click or hover over it

Read full topic
